reviewText:
Poor gals have a really hard time of it until they get to London then their fortunes change for the better, thy get plenty of good hard luck and all the food they can eat.
Fat Slags is a mix of Monty Python and Saturday Night Live. If there is anything you dislike about either show you'll dislike this one, guaranteed.
It had me laughing out loud throughout the whole movie. Fiona Allen is FUNNY!
